name: Draye DURHAM, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Durham v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Draye DURHAM, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of April, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
946 A.2d 102
Draye DURHAM, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 30, 2008.
